page.home.faq.title: FAQ
page.home.faq.subtitle: Common Questions
page.home.faq.contact: For spiritual guidance, contact us at
page.home.faq.a1: Divine Talk is an AI-powered platform that enables spiritual conversations with Jesus and the 12 Apostles, offering companionship, scripture learning, and private confession.
page.home.faq.q2: How do I start using Divine Talk?
page.home.faq.a2: Simply visit our website, choose your spiritual guide (Jesus or one of the Apostles), and begin your conversation. No registration is required to start.
page.home.faq.q3: Is my conversation private and secure?
page.home.faq.a3: Yes, all conversations and confessions are completely private and encrypted with the highest level of security. Your spiritual journey is protected.
page.home.faq.q4: Can Divine Talk replace traditional religious practice?
page.home.faq.a4: Divine Talk is designed to complement, not replace, traditional religious practice. It offers additional support for your spiritual journey alongside regular worship and community engagement.
page.home.faq.q5: What kind of support does Divine Talk provide?
page.home.faq.a5: We offer 24/7 spiritual guidance, scripture-based conversations, private confession, and educational resources to support your faith journey.
page.home.logos.title: TRUSTED BY FAITH COMMUNITIES
page.home.problem.title: Modern Spiritual Challenges
page.home.problem.subtitle: Finding spiritual connection in a digital world.
page.home.problem.data.title: Spiritual Isolation
page.home.problem.data.description: Many people feel disconnected from their faith and struggle to find meaningful spiritual guidance in today's fast-paced world.
page.home.problem.speed.title: Limited Access
page.home.problem.speed.description: Traditional religious guidance isn't always available when needed, leaving people seeking immediate spiritual support.
page.home.problem.security.title: Privacy Concerns
page.home.problem.security.description: People often hesitate to share their spiritual struggles, fearing judgment or lack of confidentiality.
page.home.solution.title: Our Divine Solution
page.home.solution.subtitle: AI-Powered Spiritual Connection
page.home.solution.description: Divine Talk offers a unique blend of traditional wisdom and modern technology to provide meaningful spiritual guidance.
page.home.solution.ai.title: Advanced Spiritual AI
page.home.solution.ai.description: Our AI is trained on scripture and religious teachings to provide authentic spiritual guidance.
page.home.solution.security.title: Complete Privacy
page.home.solution.security.description: All conversations and confessions are protected with military-grade encryption.
page.home.solution.integration.title: Seamless Experience
page.home.solution.integration.descripti: Natural voice conversations that feel like speaking with a spiritual guide.
page.home.solution.customization.title: Personalized Guidance
page.home.solution.customization.descrip: Receive guidance tailored to your spiritual journey and personal needs.

page.home.testimonials-carousel.2.text: The scripture learning feature has deepened my understanding of the Bible immensely.
page.home.testimonials-carousel.2.name: Peter Smith

page.home.testimonials-carousel.4.text: The private confession feature provides a safe space for spiritual reflection.
page.home.testimonials-carousel.4.name: James Wilson

page.home.testimonials-carousel.5.name: Elizabeth Chen

page.home.testimonials-carousel.6.name: Rev. Thomas Brown
